tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I have been Visiting Dr. Bhavin for the last few years for all my Dental issues. I had to re do all my teeth the patience and perfection with which he did was exceptional. He also explained to me at each point of time why and what he is doing.
Covid times the clinic is maintained well with all necessary precautions  from Doctors end as well as patients end requirements. One can move in without any fear of infection. One is tested for oxygen and temp too prior to going for treatment.
Good and kind staff too in the clinic.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I did my treatment for teeth straightening at American Dental Practice. I was very hesitant as I was going for the treatment pretty late as compared to the norm. Dr Bhavin answered all my queries patiently and due to his guidance I was convinced and started my treatment. I have been visiting the clinic for 3 yrs. He was always very patient and friendly. I am glad that I went ahead with the treatment and I am very happy with the end result. I strongly recommend Dr Bhavin and American dental practices.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor *** **** ********* *** explained the cause , actions taken and future steps in detail. I recommend him for other patients

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Let me share what happened with me at American Dental:

Terrible Communication *** ******************* What can you do if the Doctor and the billing desk are hand in hand in confusing the patients with treatment charges? Billing desk (Ms. Payal) at American dental won't even get back to you if you question it. I had a root canal where crown fitting session was horrible. If you value your money and your time - Don't book a slot with Dr. Bhavin Shah. When Ms. Payal at front desk or doctor explains about charges, keep a notebook nearby and record the conversation. It took no time to go back on what was told and what was charged for the complete treatment.

- Hiteshwari
reply_text:
Dear Hiteshwari ,

Thank you for the feedback and our sincere apologies for the way you feel.

We have acknowledged in our personal discussion that the charges were appropriate and fair as per our normal service price list however I do appreciate that there has been some misunderstanding over the phased treatment charges .

We will endeavour to do our best for our patients and have noted your feedback to change our payment terms which we have now implemented .

Many thanks again for your kind words on the quality of treatment received and I am grateful for your personal message .

We will be here to help if you need any further assistance in future.


Regards 

Dr Bhavin Shah

review: He was very patient and kind with my daughter with autism who needed dental fillings. He kept assuring her throughout the treatment that she’s going to be fine and it’s not going to hurt. He also explained the process to her before doing it which definitely helped!

I would like to share my feedback on my experience with the Doctor and the clinic.
The doctor is friendly as I have a fear of dental clinics and doctor, his professional attitude and continues updates on my treatment made me really feel comfortable and instantly the fear vanished.
The service quality is amazing. Very professional staff and follow up with appointments, scheduled,reminders.

I would highly recommend this doctor and clinic.
